purejavahidapi

Interface InputReportListener


  • public interface InputReportListener
    An InputReportListener gets called from background thread attached to a HidDevice every time an input report is received from the tha associated USB device.

    This is the only means of receiving input reports.

    Author:
    nyholku

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onInputReport(HidDevice source, byte reportID, byte[] reportData, int reportLength)
      This method gets called when an input report is received.

    • Method Detail

      • onInputReport

        void onInputReport(HidDevice source,
                   byte reportID,
                   byte[] reportData,
                   int reportLength)
        This method gets called when an input report is received. Note that the reportData buffer maybe larger than the actual report and thus contain garbage at the end. The buffer maybe re-used in the HidDevice object so do not keep a reference to it, instead process the data as quickly as possible and inside this call.
        Parameters:
        source - the HidDevice object that called this method
        reportID - the report Id number if used or zero
        reportData - the report data
        reportLength - report length
